radio.description: The Calvary Continuum radio show is found in the Austin area on KIXL 970 AM. You can hear Pastor Allen 5 days a week, twice a day:
The Calvary Continuum radio show is also found in the Waco area on KBW 1010 AM. You can hear Pastor Allen weekdays at 9:30 AM.

tv.description: Pastor Allen's teaching is broadcast on Austin's cable access channel 11. These lessons, videotaped during our services, can be seen at:
